htmlBody: I'm very excited to see this launch. As someone who is running an EA-aligned organisation myself, I honestly think that assistance with writing a budget could be one of the most impactful ways of helping people get a project off the ground and I would love to see someone start an additional project focusing specifically on this.
If people need help with creating a budget or just want advice, I could potentially help. Feel free to email peter@rethinkpriorities.org
